test_cases.test_name: Verification of Custom Supply Chain Optimization Engine
test_cases.objective: To verify that the custom supply chain optimization engine correctly implements proprietary algorithms for multi-objective optimization, constraint satisfaction, and dynamic routing.

test_steps.action: Load test data into the optimization engine.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data is successfully loaded and processed by the engine.

test_steps.action: Execute multi-objective optimization for cost, service level, and risk minimization.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization results are generated within 30 minutes and meet predefined criteria.

test_steps.action: Validate constraint satisfaction algorithms with pharmaceutical supply chain constraints.
test_steps.expected_result: All constraints are satisfied in the optimization results.

data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during optimization process
Maintain audit trail of optimization results

test_cases.test_name: Validation of Custom Demand Forecasting System
test_cases.objective: To validate that the custom demand forecasting system accurately implements proprietary machine learning models and seasonal adjustment algorithms.

test_steps.action: Load historical demand data into the forecasting system.
test_steps.expected_result: Historical data is successfully loaded and processed by the system.

test_steps.action: Execute demand forecasting using proprietary machine learning models.
test_steps.expected_result: Forecasting results are generated within 15 minutes and match expected patterns.

test_steps.action: Validate seasonal adjustment algorithms with pharmaceutical demand patterns.
test_steps.expected_result: Seasonal adjustments are correctly applied to the forecast results.

data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during forecasting process
Maintain audit trail of forecasting results

test_cases.test_name: Custom Supply Chain Optimization Engine Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the functionality of the custom supply chain optimization engine with proprietary algorithms, ensuring multi-objective optimization, constraint satisfaction, and advanced scenario modeling.

test_steps.action: Load a complex supply chain scenario into the optimization engine.
test_steps.expected_result: Scenario is successfully loaded and ready for optimization.

test_steps.action: Run the optimization engine with multi-objective settings.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 30 minutes with valid results.

test_steps.action: Perform sensitivity analysis on the optimized scenario.
test_steps.expected_result: Sensitivity analysis provides insights into scenario robustness.

data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all optimization results are logged and traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Demand Forecasting System Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the performance of the custom demand forecasting system, ensuring proprietary machine learning models update predictions within 15 minutes of new data.

test_steps.action: Input new market intelligence data into the forecasting system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully ingested and processed.

test_steps.action: Trigger the forecasting model update process.
test_steps.expected_result: Forecasting models update predictions within 15 minutes.

test_steps.action: Compare updated forecasts with historical data.
test_steps.expected_result: Forecasts show improved accuracy with new data.

acceptance_criteria: Forecast accuracy improves with new data.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all forecast updates are logged and traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Supply Chain Optimization Engine Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom supply chain optimization engine completes complex scenarios within the specified 30-minute timeframe.
prerequisites: System is fully installed and configured

test_steps.action: Load a complex supply chain scenario into the optimization engine.
test_steps.expected_result: Scenario is successfully loaded without errors.

test_steps.action: Run the optimization engine on the loaded scenario.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 30 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: No errors during scenario loading or optimization
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during scenario loading and optimization

test_cases.test_name: Custom Demand Forecasting System Accuracy Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the accuracy of the custom demand forecasting system's predictions against historical data.

test_steps.action: Input historical demand data into the forecasting system.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully processed without errors.

test_steps.action: Run the forecasting models on the historical data.
test_steps.expected_result: Forecasting predictions are generated within 15 minutes.

test_steps.action: Compare the forecasting predictions with actual historical data.
test_steps.expected_result: Predictions are within acceptable accuracy thresholds.

acceptance_criteria: Predictions are within acceptable accuracy thresholds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during data processing and forecasting

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Multi-Objective Optimization Algorithm Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom multi-objective optimization algorithm correctly balances cost, service level, and risk minimization for pharmaceutical supply chains.
prerequisites: Test data set with known optimal solutions
System access with optimization module permissions

test_steps.action: Load the test data set into the optimization engine
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded without errors

test_steps.action: Configure optimization parameters for cost, service level, and risk objectives
test_steps.expected_result: Parameters are correctly set and displayed in the interface

test_steps.action: Execute the optimization algorithm and record results
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 30 minutes with valid results

test_steps.action: Compare results against known optimal solutions
test_steps.expected_result: Results are within 5% of expected optimal values

acceptance_criteria: Optimization completes within specified time limit
Results meet or exceed solution quality thresholds
data_integrity_requirements: Input data must be validated before processing
All optimization parameters must be logged
Results must be stored with complete audit trail

test_cases.test_name: Custom Supplier Risk Assessment System Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the proprietary supplier risk scoring system correctly evaluates and ranks suppliers based on multiple risk dimensions.
prerequisites: Test supplier database with known risk profiles
System access with supplier management permissions

test_steps.action: Load test supplier data into the risk assessment system
test_steps.expected_result: Supplier data is successfully loaded and validated

test_steps.action: Execute the proprietary risk scoring algorithm
test_steps.expected_result: Risk scores are generated for all suppliers within 15 minutes

test_steps.action: Verify risk scores against known supplier risk profiles
test_steps.expected_result: Scores correctly reflect supplier risk levels with 90% accuracy

test_steps.action: Generate supplier development recommendations
test_steps.expected_result: Recommendations are appropriate for each supplier's risk profile

acceptance_criteria: Risk scores generated within specified time limit
Score accuracy meets or exceeds 90% threshold
data_integrity_requirements: Supplier data must be validated before processing
All risk scoring parameters must be logged
Recommendations must be traceable to input data

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Multi-Objective Optimization Algorithm Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom supply chain optimization engine correctly implements proprietary multi-objective optimization algorithms for cost, service level, and risk minimization.
prerequisites: Test environment with sample supply chain data

test_steps.action: Load sample pharmaceutical supply chain dataset into the optimization engine
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is successfully loaded and validated by the system

test_steps.action: Configure optimization parameters for cost, service level, and risk objectives
test_steps.expected_result: Parameters are correctly set and system accepts all constraints

test_steps.action: Execute optimization algorithm and capture results
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 30 minutes with valid solution

acceptance_criteria: Optimization completes within specified time limit
Pareto optimal solutions demonstrate proper trade-offs between objectives
data_integrity_requirements: All input data must be validated before processing
Optimization results must be traceable to input parameters
Algorithm execution must be logged for audit purposes

test_cases.test_name: Custom Regulatory Compliance Integration System Validation
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom regulatory compliance integration system properly tracks serialization and generates required documentation for pharmaceutical supply chain.
prerequisites: Test environment with regulatory compliance module
Configured regulatory requirements for test jurisdictions

test_steps.action: Load test dataset of serialized pharmaceutical products
test_steps.expected_result: System validates and accepts all serialization data

test_steps.action: Simulate supply chain movements across multiple jurisdictions
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly applies all jurisdictional regulatory requirements

test_steps.action: Generate regulatory documentation for simulated supply chain events
test_steps.expected_result: Complete and accurate documentation is generated for all events

acceptance_criteria: All serialized products are properly tracked through supply chain
Generated documentation meets all regulatory standards
Audit trail captures all compliance-related decisions
data_integrity_requirements: Serialization data must maintain full traceability
Regulatory decisions must be logged with timestamp and user
Document generation must use validated templates

test_steps.expected_result: Optimization process starts without errors.

test_cases.test_name: Integration Testing with ERP System via Custom API
test_cases.objective: To ensure the custom API successfully integrates with the ERP system for data exchange.

test_steps.action: Configure the ERP system to connect with the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Connection is established without errors.

test_steps.action: Send a test data set from the ERP system to the custom API.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully received by the API.

test_steps.action: Verify the data integrity and accuracy in the API response.
test_steps.expected_result: Data matches the original test set without discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: Data is accurately exchanged between ERP system and custom API.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity is maintained during transmission.
